SELECT cf.competition_favorite_id, cf.competition_id, cf.user_id, cf.deleted, cf.created_time, cf.updated_time FROM competition_favorite AS cf
cf.deleted = 0
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM competition c WHERE c.competition_id = cf.competition_id AND c.competition_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{competitionName}, '%') )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM competition c WHERE c.competition_id = cf.competition_id AND c.status = #{competitionStatus} )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM competition c WHERE c.competition_id = cf.competition_id AND c.level_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{levelName}, '%') )
ORDER BY cf.updated_time DESC
